name: brandapis: User Registration, Update and Authentication APIs

folders.name: 1 User Registration
folders.description: Call createUser with password to create an account.

folders.name: 2. Social User Registration
folders.description: Register social user. Authenticate after registration and get user data.

folders.name: 3. User Authentication and Access
folders.description: tests related to authentication of Brand API users

folders.name: 5. Account LInking
folders.description: Link and unlink social user to another account.

folders.name: 8. Confirmation Email
folders.description: Send user confirmation email again and confirm account.
